content: Are clippy bug fixes considered for backporting during beta?
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/issues/6344 has been a pretty painful issue hitting stable in 1.49 :(

The problem with beta is that not many people are using it, and less so running Clippy on beta, I think.
But yeah, if we're aware of any bigger issues, we would do a backport for particular fixes, just not for every single fix.

Backporting fixes to beta wouldn't be a problem, we just have to know that people hit this in beta. Backporting to stable with a point release won't happen for a Clippy fix, unless it is something that is really broken, like ICEs in popular crates.
